name: ap-lang-app
description: Web app for **AP English Language & Composition** practice.

scripts.dev:api: cd api && cp -n .env.example .env && npm run dev
scripts.e2e:db:reset: cd api && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run seed
scripts.e2e:run: concurrently -k -s first -n api,web "cd api && cp -n .env.example .env && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev"
